content:
AsymmetricSignatureAlgorithm.CreateSignatureTransform Method

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.Cryptography
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.Cryptography.dll

In this Article

Creates a signature transformation implementation that may be used to sign or verify.

public abstract Microsoft.Azure.KeyVault.Cryptography.ISignatureTransform CreateSignatureTransform (System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm key);
Parameters
key
AsymmetricAlgorithm

The asymmetric key to use.

Returns
ISignatureTransform

An ISignatureTransform implementation.

Remarks

The transform implementation "borrows" the supplied AsymmetricAlgorithm; callers should not call Dispose on the AsymmetricAlgorithm until use of the transform implementation is complete.
